title: ZizZazz logo
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201090506im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/ZizZazz_5919.jpg)

Hi, I have tried to find this logo in vector, but I couldn’t find it online. So I would like to know what fonts are used for “ZizZazz” and “.com.” Thank you very much for your help in advance.

 [‹ Type ID Help](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201090506/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49580 "Go to previous forum topic") [Condensed gothic. Possibly wood type ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201090506/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49576 "Go to next forum topic")
author: misalion

comments.content:
Hi again.  
I decided to recreate “ZizZazz” part. But what is the font for “Shake it up?”
